text: Show me the latest email.
What is a summary of the last message?
List unread emails from the past month.
Find the most recent thread that has attachments.
Pull all emails with attachments in the last 30 days.

Get the latest payment-related message.
Find the last time we received an email mentioning ‘quote’.

Pull the most recent email that mentions both ‘order’ and ‘delivery’.
